column4: i'm fed up with that gnome-keyring, every time type password, it's boring how can i remove it, and if i do so what will go wrong?*

applcations -> acessories -> passwords -> right click on the one entry that says LOGIN: i recall. and use teh change password menu item
you are using gnome?  Applications -> accessories menu  is right there for me.
video of doing it at --> http://drop.io/dr_willis
